item.description:
A big sympathy to Larry for the loss of his Mom. You are a great person Larry and we are so very lucky to have you in our Cribbage Meet Up.

Ellen returned which is great, Debbie is new and said she would return (I don't think I beat her too badly)

As for Captain Bette and Emad, such great tans and I thought I was the tanned one :( Look at the photos to see tanned. Thank you ever so much Gabe, what a fun group and photos to prove it :) I am trying to upload the one of all of us.

Susan was a great trooper throughout the evening as was Teresa and Laura.

Please remember we meet at a restaurant and bringing your own food/water is not nice at all. Also they do wait on us and do bring us our food, so how about a nice tip for them. There is a cup at the register to put in a tip, which they really do deserve.

Can't wait to see y'all in October, thanks for being such a great group of friends as well as G*R*E*A*T cribbage players...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet-Up - Are we ready for the Dark and Cold :(
